article_title: Anthem Blue Cross' $38 Billion Move From Fee-For-Service Medicine

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Joining the parade of health insurance companies leaving fee-for-service medicine in its wake, Anthem (ANTM) says it, too, will ramp up value-based payments to providers of medical care beyond the nearly $40 billion annual commitment it is already making. The nation’s second-largest health insurer is moving quickly from the traditional fee-for-service [...]
